MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH3 postcode area of Broxton affecting properties in Padge Lane, Old Coach Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.59AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the electrical cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.41 AM on 30th January 2021.
